meanings.definition: To form an approximate judgment or opinion regarding the worth, amount, size, weight, etc., of; calculate approximately
meanings.sent1: She estimated the distance to be about ten miles.
meanings.sent2: He estimated the cost of the project before starting.
meanings.sent3: The kids estimated the number of candies in the jar for fun.
meanings.sent4: The detective estimated the time of the crime based on the evidence.
meanings.sent5: The teacher estimated the time it would take to finish the assignment.

meanings.definition: To form an opinion of; judge
meanings.sent1: They estimated the quality of the movie after watching the trailer.
meanings.sent2: She estimated his character based on his actions.
meanings.sent3: The cat estimated the height of the counter before attempting to jump.
meanings.sent4: He estimated the taste of the dish before even trying it.
meanings.sent5: The artist estimated the value of the painting before putting it up for sale.
